attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please cut the fuel tax your killing the working folk with the tax need my car to work and cant buy more clothes for my children due to the high tax on fuel and the rising cost. I ask you consider the working class and cut the fuel duty. Before we cant afford to work!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
